infos.value: At the Farplane Archives, you can obtain items and equipment materials that you missed in the past.

◆ Farplane Archives ◆
A place where you can take on Limited Quests that were held in the past.

◆ Selecting Quests ◆
Tap one of the tabs to select the type of quest.

◆ Unlocking Quests ◆
You can use designated items to unlock quests for a limited time. During this time, you can attempt the quests as often as you like.

◆ Unlocking Multi Quests ◆
When Multi Quests are unlocked at the same time, a shortcut button you can use to view the Multi Quest list will appear.
<color=#00ffff>Mog Shops</color> or <color=#00ffff>Missions</color> that are connected to unlocked quests will also become available.

◆ Free Unlocks ◆
A certain number of quests per day can be unlocked for free. This number is reset every day at 00:00 World Time (PST).
Proceed to a tutorial on the Farplane Archives?
